doc:
Peter Bergman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Bergman 0 Peter Michael Bergman (born June 11, 1953) is an American actor best known for his portrayals as Dr. Cliff Warner on All My Children (1979–89) as well as Jack Abbott on The Young and the Restless (1989–present). Peter_Michael_Bergman ( born June_11_,_1953 ) is an_American_actor best_known for his_portrayals as Dr._Cliff_Warner on All_My_Children ( 1979 – 89 ) as_well as Jack_Abbott on The_Young and the_Restless ( 1989 – present ) .
